message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $15000. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $15000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10000 for it, which is the maximum I can afford. Let me know what you think.
